Author: cipi#4502
Content: lol... windows... what a massive global waste of development manpower

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I was actually expecting this kinda of issue. and that is why I was asking if any of the testers found any bug or not before merging it to dev ðŸ˜„

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: the issue is that on html load finishing the javascript code on html side triggers to get the list of `coins` file data which is downloaded from github, so that it can show all those coins' list in the drop down select box, but since it takes more time to reflect the result, the code asynchronously moves to the next part before it gets the results and just executes the code check for `if the returned db data is == 0`

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: and just executes that part, and then again triggers the next call to re execute and check if the db is having some data or not, and I see it executes it like 20 times before quiting, means getting the expected data output

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: thing is I have not put that part in promise code, so that will probably fix it.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: doing jus that
